text: Ubuntu Live USB Creator is an official tool to create Live USBs of Ubuntu from an iso image. The tool is already included in the repositories of Ubuntu 8.10. ==Features== *Optional persistence (all changes made to the system are saved, unlike a Live CD) *Progress indicator *Does not format the device ==Related pages== * List of tools to create Live USB systems * Live USB system creator == Other websites == *Project page at Launchpad *cd2usb - Similar tool (for Microsoft Windows) Category:Linux software
title: Ubuntu Live USB creator
